Welcome to Yongfei's Homepage




Bio

Yongfei Wang is a PhD candidate of the joint University of California, San Diego (Scripps/UCSD)/San Diego State University (SDSU) Geophysics program. He, under supervision of Prof. Steven Day and Prof. Peter Shearer, has been working on observability of rupture dynamics and earthquake ground motion simulations. He will begin his postdoctoral research at Southern California Earthquake Center (SCEC), University of Southern California.


Research Area:

  • Earthquake Rupture Dynamics
  • Earthquake Strong Ground Motion
  • High-performance Computation
  • 3D Visualization
